author: The Vegetarian Society
method: Steam the carrots and apricots together for 20 minutes, until the carrots are very soft.  Process to a fine puree in food processor. Add cream and season to taste. The puree may be piped into rosette shapes and garnished with steamed carrot flowers. To make carrot flowers, use a channelling knife (also known as a canelle knife, available from cookware shops) to cut 5 equally spaced grooves down from top to bottom of a peeled carrot. Slice the carrot crossways into rounds to achieve a flower shape.
ingredients: 675g/1lb 8oz carrots, peeled and chopped ,  100g/4oz apricots, cut into quarters using scissors ,  2 tbsp thick cream, optional ,  salt and black pepper to taste
